name: tameable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a wild animal is tameable, it can be trained to make it less dangerous and able to be around people: Some species are more tameable than others.
able to be controlled: products to make your hair more tameable See
tame
More examplesFewer examplesIt helps if it is a social species, but some solitary animals are quite tameable.Wolves are not an animal I would portray as very tameable or trainable.a tameable horseGood art is not tame or tameable.Would the outspoken and stupendously wealthy woman he married be tameable?
